name: who killed thelonious
description:
A murder mystery! A prestigious dinner party! (an LA Noire rip off).
----------------
ONE KILLER. ONE PIECE OF EVIDENCE PER GUEST TO PROVE THEIR INNOCENCE.

One of these guest's stories doesn't line up... Since accusing the killer wasn't implemented, message Billy Joel’s Nightmare Explosion#0465 when you've figured it out!
----------------

CONTROLS

----------------

"WASD" to move!

"E" to view collected evidence!

"SPACE" to talk to guests, the police, and pick up pieces of evidence!

"Alt + F4" IS THE ONLY WAY TO CLOSE THE GAME! HOW THRILLING!
